issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
During our KS pass on the image views section, I noted that no images were displayed and no console output showing frame was logged for the "animated" test. Additionally, the same behavior occurred with "image rapid update"

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI > Views > Image Views > Animated OR Base UI > Views > Image Views > Image Rapid Update
3) Click "start animation" button

Result:
No images displayed, no console output

Expected:
Images of fire animated, console outputting frame counter
fields.summary: Android: Image: v8/Rhino: No animated images are displayed
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111108105548, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler & Rhino compiler

comments.body:
Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111207090257
Xoom (3.2.1) - v8
Samsung Tab 10.1 (3.1) - rhino
